meanings.def: a light strong material that is produced by chemical processes and can be formed into shapes when heated. There are many different types of plastic, used to make different objects and fabrics.
examples: The pipes should be made of plastic.

meanings.def: a way of talking about credit cards
that seems artificial; false; not real or sincere
examples: TV game show hosts with their banal remarks and plastic smiles
The flight attendants served up plastic food with little taste or texture.
